title: MSI GeForce RTX 4070 Ti Gaming X Trio 12G GDDR6X GPU
description: Experience exceptional gaming performance with the MSI GeForce RTX 4070 Ti Gaming X Trio. This high-end graphics card features 12GB GDDR6X memory, advanced ray tracing capabilities, and DLSS 3.0 technology for stunning visual fidelity. The Gaming X Trio design includes premium cooling with three fans and RGB lighting. Perfect for 4K gaming, content creation, and AI workloads. This used unit is in excellent condition and fully tested.
